Welcome To The Hop!
Asheville Ice Cream, Events and Parties

Welcome!

About

The Hop proudly serves Asheville, NC with homemade ice cream, coffee, speciality items and more. The Huffington Post calls the Hop one of the 12 Best Ice Cream Shops in America.

Family-Owned

Events

Parties

Host your next event at one of our Asheville locations!

Ice Cream Cakes

We make ice cream cakes from scratch to order with a variety of custom decorative options. Check out our Specialty Deserts Menu for more details!

Birthday Parties

We host birthday parties with a variety of food and activity options. Click here to see our different packages and prices.

Catering

Serving Weddings and Group Celebrations, Employee Appreciation Parties, Outdoor Gatherings and more. Call us at 828.254.2224 for more information.
